# rmdtemplates

rmdtemplates is a collection of rmarkdown templates.

## Installation

You can install rmdtemplates from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jolars/rmdtemplates")
```
